page.title: 14TOURISM
page.content: We conducted a survey on Holidays,as to know how many people take a holiday and how often. We found that 40% take a yearly holiday,50% when possible and 10% of the people interviewed never. Our survey also showed that 50% preferred holidaying abroad whilst 45% stayed in the British Isles. The most popular mode of travel was by car,50% preffered this,29% preffered plane,9% boat and 7% train. The most popular form of holiday accommadation was hotel,this covered 35%.25% enjoyed self catering,15% in a caravan,11% camping and 8% in Holiday Camps and Touring.
